history.proof: intros a1 a2 b1 b2 H1 H2. unfold projf2. srun best use: quotient_projection_collapses_R.

ctx: intros a1 a2 b1 b2 H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (slices_well_defined A B C R S f equivR a1 a2 b1 b2 H1 H2).
exceptions.exn: In environment A, B, C : Type R : relation A S : relation B T : relation C f : A -> B -> C equivR : equivalence R equivS : equivalence S equivT : equivalence T well_defined3 : forall (a1 a2 : A) (b1 b2 : B), R a1 a2 -> S b1 b2 -> T (f a1 b1) (f a2 b2) a1, a2 : A b1, b2 : B H1 : R a1 a2 H2 : S b1 b2 The term "A" has type "Type" while it is expected to have type "relation ?B".

original: intros a1 a2 b1 b2 H1 H2. unfold projf2. apply (slices_well_defined A B C R S f equivR a1 a2 b1 b2 H1 H2).
